original_text: Now you must all leave your towns. Go and live among the rocks. Live like doves that make their nests high up among the rocks. Now you must all leave your towns. Go and live among the rocks. Live like doves that make their nests high up among the rocks. Now you must all leave your towns.
korean_text: 모압 주민들아 너희는 성읍을 떠나 바위 사이에 살지어다 출입문 어귀 가장자리에 깃들이는 비둘기 같이 할지어다

sentences.original_text: Now you must all leave your towns.
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 너희는 모두 너희 도시를 떠나야 한다.

sentences.original_text: Go and live among the rocks.
that make their nests high up among the rocks.
sentences.korean_translation: 바위 높은 곳에 둥지를 트는 비둘기처럼.

sentences.original_text: Now you must all leave your towns.
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 너희는 모두 너희 도시를 떠나야 한다.

sentences.original_text: Go and live among the rocks.
that make their nests high up among the rocks.
sentences.korean_translation: 바위 높은 곳에 둥지를 트는 비둘기처럼.

sentences.original_text: Now you must all leave your towns.
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 너희는 모두 너희 도시를 떠나야 한다.
